column4: gah! im stuck at version 8.04 of ubuntu and i can upgrade out of it, can anyone with some expertiese walk me through upgrading?
when you are in 8.04 and want to update, I recommend doing it from cd and doing a fresh install.
I updated 2 computers from 8.04 to 9.10 and it took hours and in the end both systems rendered a bit more sluggish than they should be compared to a fresh install
download and burn the 9.10 cd and install it from scratch
